title: Guess the Lines Week 5 With Cousin Sal | The Bill Simmons Podcast (Ep. 422)
description:
HBO and The Ringer's Bill Simmons is joined by Cousin Sal to discuss the eventful Bengals-Falcons matchup, the Browns-Raiders shootout, and the coaching debacle that occurred during the Colts-Texans game (among others), before they guess the NFL Lines for week 5.

      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
